QuestData.Title: The Fate of the Dead
QuestData.Description: The town square, down this path, is overrun with the undead citizens of Wintergarde! Our own crypt provides a seemingly endless supply of soldiers for the Scourge to throw at us. Take no pity on them, though, $n. While they were once mortal, capable of compassion and thought, they are now ravaging undead with only one purpose: our destruction.$B$BVenture forth to the town square and deliver the vengeful geists to their maker. Give them peace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Lynore Windstryke at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight wants you to kill 15 Vengeful Geists.
QuestData.CompletionText: Put them out of their misery, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps now they will rest easy, their spirits free to ascend to the Light.$B$BMy thoughts and prayers now turn to Lord Fordragon and our forces at the Wrathgate. We must persevere here, if only to buy them enough time to defeat the Lich King. Wintergarde cannot fall.
